description:
The Scheduler Extension for LabChart allows the scheduling of recordings across one or more LabChart data files.

The Scheduler Extension for LabChart allows the scheduling of recordings across one or more LabChart data files. A schedule may consist of an initial delay, followed by repeated recording cycles, until a specified end time. Scheduler can also be used with external scheduling devices, such as the TR Scheduler Pod.
Changes Since Previous Version
There have been various enhancements and changes to the following:
- Improvements have been made to autosave
- Improvements have been made to opening existing LabChart documents with Scheduler settings.
